data.message: Oh are these the guys who decide to make changes to fb with out thinking of how those changes are going to affect the visually impaired or disabled. Oh sorry any one who uses fb is not disabled or visually impaired. That's why the don't give a dam about how the changes they make affect others. Woops did I just have a rant there bet fb will put me in the sin bin and ban me from posting and or messaging because I dare use my fight to freedom of speech hahaha RANT OVER. From a Half blind fb user who is fed up with changes being made to fb with out due consideration for us disabled idiots
